description: The file defines a React component named 'Column', which represents a Kanban board column. It manages the rendering of the column header, inline editing of the column title, deletion confirmation modal, and includes references to card list components.

methods.name: validateNewTitle(str)
methods.description: Validates the new column title input for empty or unchanged titles.

methods.name: triggerTitleEdit
methods.description: Starts inline editing mode for the column title.

methods.name: saveEditTitle
methods.description: Saves the new column title after validation, handles API response, and displays toast notifications.

methods.name: handleTitleInputKey
methods.description: Handles key events in the title input, triggering save or cancel actions.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Sets the modal state to prompt for column deletion.

methods.name: doDelete
methods.description: Calls the deleteColumn function and shows a toast upon success.
